description: This file is the main application component for a React-based trivia quiz frontend. It manages authentication, theme toggling, routing, and WebSocket connections, and orchestrates rendering of various subcomponents such as AuthPage, CategoryPage, QuizPage, and modals for instructions and results.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main functional React component managing application state and routing.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle between light and dark themes.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the user by calling the auth service and updating authentication state.

methods.name: handleFinishQuiz
methods.description: Handles completion of the quiz, storing results and displaying the result modal.

methods.name: connectWebSocket
methods.description: Establishes a WebSocket connection using URL from service and returns the WebSocket instance.
